hibernate-mapping.query: from District d where d.status=? and d.parent.id=?
select count(*) from District d where d.status=? and d.parent.id=?
select distinct d from District d join fetch d.parent left join fetch d.nameTemporals t left join fetch t.value v left join fetch v.translations where d.id=? and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31'
select distinct d from District d join fetch d.parent left join fetch d.nameTemporals t left join fetch t.value v left join fetch v.translations where d.id in (:ids) and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31'
select min(id), max(id), count(id) from District where status=0 and parent.id=?
select new District(id) from District where status=0 and parent.id=? and id between ? and ?

select distinct d from District d left join fetch d.nameTemporals t left join fetch t.value v left join fetch v.translations tr where d.status=0 and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and d.parent.id=? and upper(tr.name) like ?
select distinct d from District d left join d.nameTemporals t left join t.value v left join v.translations tr where d.status=0 and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and d.parent.id=? and tr.name=?

select distinct d from District d left join d.nameTemporals t left join t.value v left join v.translations tr where d.status=0 and t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and d.parent.id=? and tr.name=? and tr.lang.id=?

select distinct d from District d inner join fetch d.parent t left join fetch t.parent r left join fetch r.parent left join fetch d.nameTemporals nt left join fetch nt.value v left join fetch v.translations where d.id=? and nt.invalidDate='2100-12-31'
select distinct n from DistrictName n left join fetch n.object left join fetch n.translations where n.id=?
